definition: decline to comment/not express an opinion/be noncommittal/hedge
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.chinese: 他咬了咬嘴唇，不置可否。

sentences.english: Dumb sister asked not to say yes or no, the small red chamber will really accept it cheval.
sentences.chinese: 哑妹不置可否，问小红楼真的会接纳雪娃吗。

sentences.english: The church's letter of response, published in a state-run newspaper, Rossiyskaya Gazeta, suggested not.
sentences.chinese: 刊登在国营《俄罗斯报》上的教会回信对此不置可否。

sentences.english: The spokesman slurred over the matter without giving a straight answer.
sentences.chinese: 发言人对这件事不置可否，含糊其词。

definition: not to accept as correct (idiom); to object/to disapprove/to take exception to
not in the least concerned (idiom)/reckless/couldn't give a damn about it/unperturbed/couldn't care less/harum scarum
to refuse to comment/same as 不置可否
like a smile yet not a smile (idiom)
not a word or movement (idiom); remaining calm and collected/not batting an eyelid
to have a smile on one's face
to not mind (at all, a bit)/to not care in the slightest
to disdain to do sth/to think sth not worth doing/to feel it beneath one's dignity
